sentences.sentence: I got the advertizement information in the newspaper. I am here applying for the position of tourist guide.
sentences.translation: 我从报纸上得到你们的招聘信息。我是来应聘导游这一职位的。

sentences.sentence: Through using high-technology to become the leader of outdoor media network, establish whole new advertizement value system.
sentences.translation: 通过应用高科技，力争打造国内领先的户外动感传媒，构建全新的广告价值链体系。

sentences.sentence: This article introduces the selection of screen printing materials and methods for advertizement on umbrella, metal plate, T-shirt, flag and see-through film on cars, etc.
sentences.translation: 详细介绍了网印材料的合理选用及广告伞、户外喷漆金属板、广告衫、旗帜、汽车透视膜等常见广告物品的印刷方法，供参考。
